1.long: I fill with power, strengthen, make strong.

gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

2.brief: I set before, serve, entrust to
2.long: (a) I set (especially a meal) before, serve, (b) act. and mid: I deposit with, entrust to, (c) I bring forward, quote as evidence.

2.brief: a man, one of the human race
2.long: a man, one of the human race.
(a) considerable, sufficient, of number, quantity, time, (b) of persons: sufficiently strong (good, etc.), worthy, suitable, with various constructions, (c) many, much.

first, in the first place, before, formerly.
